thread.title: Refugee crisis: Church of England attacks Government's 'inadequate' response
thread.title_full: Refugee crisis: Church of England attacks Government's 'inadequate' response - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Refugee crisis: Church of England attacks Government's 'inadequate' response
text: The Government â€™s response to the refugee crisis has come under fire from the Church of England , after it emerged the Prime Minister ignored an offer from 84 bishops to lead a national movement to house and support thousands of needy people.
